description:
He infiltrates Hakuhou Girls` Academy`s High School division under the guise of a teacher. He is also the advisor for the yacht club, but his true identity is the helmsman of the Bentenmaru. Along with http://anidb.net/ch37525 [Misa], he supports and instructs http://anidb.net/ch35552 [Marika] as she tries to observe and learn how to become the ship`s captain.
Source: Official Site
name: Kane McDougal
